name: Xtreme | XOS | Network | LBD | Vlan Loop Detected (SYSLOG)
description:
ELRP.Report: [CLI:vlan3333:1] LOOP DETECTED : 136 transmited, 1 received, ingress slot:port (11) egress slot:port (10)
(?P<interface>\S+)

patterns.value_re: ELRP\.Report: \[CLI:vlan(?P<vlan>\d+):\d+] LOOP DETECTED : \d+ transmited, \d+ received, ingress slot:(?P<interface>\S+ \(\d+\))

test_cases.message:
ELRP.Report: [CLI:vlan3333:1] LOOP DETECTED : 136 transmited, 1 received, ingress slot:port (11) egress slot:port (10)
(?P<interface>\S+)
